cab.content: SECRET.BATTLE SITUATION - MIDDAY - 25th APRIL, 1918,1. As a result of a counter-attack against VILLERS-BRETONNEUX we have gained some ground, and have reached points north-east and south-east of the village. The situation is satisfactory and it is hoped to deal with the pocket of the enemy during the course of to-day. About 500 prisoners have been captured,2, A heavy German attack developed this morning against the line KEMMEL - WYTSCHAETE.- No details are yet available,LATER.There is an unconfirmed report that the enemy have a footing on KEMMEL HILL and have also gained ground between KEMMEL HILL and VTERSTRAAT.General Staff,War Office, S.W.1.25th April, 1918,Issued at 1,50 p.m.
